title: Riot Hitbox!
body:
Hey ,

Please look at the pictures, and tell me your opinion. 

Push this post so that riot finally fixes it

https://imgur.com/a/s3zdRhz

https://imgur.com/a/GC17a5P


sorry for my bad English

replies.body: Dasselbe mit Leona, Blitzcrank, Nautilus und 100 anderen Hitboxen.... Diese passen NIE zum Visual und ist einfach nur nervig aber riot gibt einen dicken Sch*** auf sowas

It clearly hit as you can see... 
even though the target is almost a riven dash away from that hook.. 


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 



seriously i stopped complaining about hit boxes since ezreal can e while stunlocked in a full Leona combo...
